title: 9: S5E09 – "The Depths of Depravity" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from Rick Pyle, Simon Nagel, Tyler King Lee, and Adam Bolander, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about deals with devils, eerie elevators, malevolent morticians, and supernatural stalkers.



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
